review_details: We had a lovely afternoon with Julia! She told us about lots of different techniques to make wines, made us beautiful, traditional Greek snacks and showed us around the co - operative winery. As well as letting us taste various wines, of course!

reviewTitle: Amazing trip! Would recommend to a friend.. or you!
